snippet: Kevin Burke led two second-half touchdown drives, and Mount Union ended a three-year losing streak in the Amos Alonzo Stagg Bowl, the Division III national championship, with a 28-10 victory over St. Thomas of Minnesota in Salem, Va.
abstract: Mount Union defeats St Thomas of Minnesota, 28-10, in Amos Alonzo Stagg Bowl.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Burke led two second-half touchdown drives, and Mount Union ended a three-year losing streak in the Amos Alonzo Stagg Bowl, the Division III national championship, with a 28-10 victory over St. Thomas of Minnesota in Salem, Va.

headline.main: Mount Union Wins Division III National Title
headline.print_headline: Mount Union Wins Div. III Title
